xml.name: Next/Previous Occurrences
xml.Try: IntelliJ IDEA allows you to navigate between occurrences. First of all, select cellphone in the code, and press Find to call the Find action
To find next occurrences use EditorEnter or FindNext

With the search panel closed you can still use these shortcuts to navigate between occurrences of the item being searched for earlier. Close search panel by pressing EditorEscape and try to find next occurrence with FindNext
And FindPrevious in a back way.
